REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0779 reute r f BC-TWA-<TWA>-PILOTS-WELC 03-05 0064

TEXT.TITLE: TWA <TWA> PILOTS WELCOME BID FOR USAIR <U>
TEXT.BODY: The Airline Pilots Association said members working at Trans World Airlines Inc welcomed their airline's announced proposal to acquire USAir Group Inc,. Union leaders for the TWA pilot group said the offer of 52 dlrs a share was a positive indication that Carl Icahn intends to build TWA into a viable air carrier. Reuter
